Career Profile

I'm Ayomide Aro - A creative person who is so passionate about using technology to improve and impact lives. I have experiences in building applications for several areas cutting across mobile & web development and other areas, with a strong feel for machine learning and artificial intelligence.

A detail-oriented programmer and architect with 3+ years' success devising innovative and tailored solutions to meet ever-changing business requirements within diverse industries. Advanced skill with leading-edge programming tools complemented by proven ability to assimilate and rapidly utilize emerging technologies. Solid mathematical knowledge with experience developing comprehensive algorithms.
